title: Hamlet [Animated]
creator_credit: et al, Natalia Orlova, Elizabeth Babakhina, Christopher Grace and BBC-TV
brief_description: With two US Emmy Awards, “Shakespeare - Animated tales” has won a vast new audience with its skilful, 30 minute adaptations. This can be used as a companion piece to the study of “Hamlet”, however it is far too succinct a precis to be a useful study piece for serious students of the Bard.
